name: Gun.Io
description:
This is a .io game, meaning that it has totally real multiplayer, and it is a simple top down shooter. You use W,A,S and D to move, You can use your mouse or spacebar to shoot, and E to switch to the double barrel shotgun if you have ammo. Ammo is provided by the lightning ability, while lives are provided by the heart ability.

Can you top the leaderboard?

Made by GiantMarble Studios.
